title: [My best friend's wedding : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production My Best Friend’s Wedding (1997), including 4 35mm Colour Transparencies, 1 Press Kit/ Review. Director P.J. Hogan, Starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Rachel Griffiths.
